content.description: Sit start using a good left leaning edge move up and left to a tiny little pinch thing and then throw up to the sloper and power up to the top.  It's short...real short...but each move packs a punch.
content.location: Just off the motorcycle trail in the East forest.  Walk by the lightning and seems boulders and look to the left, you will see a little boulder with a short over hanging route on it.  Tripple short is behind this boulder hidden out of veiw...you have to scramble up and over some boulders to find it.

content.description: Begin per Elementary and move right into Midnight Lichen.
content.location: Left side of the Midnight Lichen boulder.

content.description: Begin seated with the left hand on the protruding nose and right hand pinching the slot feature. Move to the good rail and finish above.
content.location: To the right of Sinking Slopers

content.description: Climb the face of the Stinking Slopers boulder.  Start on Stinking Slopers start holds, move up to left leaning side pull and continue to the top
content.location: The east forest up the motorcycle trail.  On the south face of the Stinking Slopers boulder.

content.description: Left exit to Midnight Lichen.  Instead of bumping to the right rail from a right crimp, head left to a sharp crimp.  Match and then head up the long diagonal seam.

Sit start with a large side pull on the right and an opposing smaller side pull to the left for your left hand. First move to a very distinct lightning bolt shaped crimp then climb up and right for the top out. A pretty fun problem, worth checking out if you haven't climbed it before.
content.protection: 1 pad and a spotter helps to keep your back off the stump behind you if you fall.
content.location: On the boulder just 80ft southwest of the Samurai. A large stump sits right in front of the boulder about 4ft away

content.description: Start seated using an obvious edge below the arete, just left of the tree. Make a short move to the arete and work left to the apex. A more challenging variation makes an early move into the start of Midnight Lichen.
content.location: Right side of the Midnight Lichen boulder.

content.description:
Same start as

Baby's Mama

; SDS on opposing sidepulls.  Head up to the right along seam.  Don't fall in the hole.  Short Problem but fun.
content.location:
Along motorcylce trail in the east forest.  Just passed the Lighting Bolt and Seams boulder on the left side of the trail.  On a small boulder next to a large stump. Close to

Triple Short

and same start as

Baby's Mama

.

content.description: Climb straight up the left side of the boulder from two obvious diagonal rails.
content.location: Left side of Midnight Lichen boulder.

content.description:
SDS; same start as

Ice Cold

.  Right hand on low sidepull and left on slightly sloping hold.  Head straight up and a little to the left on small crimpers near the left arete.
content.location:
Along the motorcycle trail in East Forest, just past the Lighting Bolt and Seam Boulders on the left side of the trail.  Large 6' high stump next to boulder. Same start as

Ice Cold

.
